page.title: 20The Ecology of Hoo
page.content: This region is quite diverse and is bordered along the south by the upper estuary of the{River Medway.}Due to the salt water and fresh water mix an interesting variety of wildlife is found along the river which consists of a stoney shoreline and a large area of{salt marsh.}As the latter area is largely inaccessable,an extensive variety of bird life is found, particularly waders. Most of the rest of the region consists of farmland(meadows, cereals,market gardening, orchards ), but there are two regions of mixed woodland at Deangate and Cockham Woods. Just outside the region but having a strong influence on it is {Kingsnorth Power Station.}Although the chimney is tall(600ft.), the fallout of sulphur dioxide is apparent by the absence of lichen in the area.
